description: Reliability engineering as an integral part of component and system design in electronics and computer systems, electrical power systems and mechanical systems. Reliability mathematics, and fundamental concepts in reliability engineering including reliability networks, reliability evaluation techniques, failure mode and effects analysis (FMEA), and reliability apportionment. System modeling techniques such as Fault Trees and Markov chains. Concepts of common cause failures and human reliability. Methods of analyzing and incorporating uncertainty in reliability data to the reliability models.
name: ENG RELIABILITY
